body_html: @vishwakftw would Magma 2.4 fix it, instead of 2.3? I'm asking because Magma's batch inverse routines are much faster than CuBLAS's routines for large batch size / large matrix size (according to @martinarjovsky ), so I'd avoid moving to cublas for this.
